languages.text: "Стала"... это такое странное слово. Вроде и верное, но разве так говорят о предназначении? Если вопрос о том, каков был сам путь — об этом рассказать несложно. Сначала я, как и многие имперские сироты, прошла {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Схола Прогениум{/g}. Это были суровые годы, но я вспоминаю о них с радостью. Мало что сравнится с ощущением пройденного испытания, даже если после тело стонет от усталости или душа сжимается от боли".

traits.locale_text: "Стала"... это такое странное слово. Вроде и верное, но разве так говорят о предназначении? Если вопрос о том, каков был сам путь — об этом рассказать несложно. Сначала я, как и многие имперские сироты, прошла Схола Прогениум. Это были суровые годы, но я вспоминаю о них с радостью. Мало что сравниться с ощущением пройденного испытания, даже если после тело стонет от усталости или душа сжимается от боли".

languages.text: "'Become'... It's such a strange word for it. It seems right, but is that how one talks about their destiny? If you're asking about the path itself — that's easy enough to answer. First, like many other orphans, I endured the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Those years were rough, but I remember the hardship fondly. Few things can compare with the feeling of satisfaction from a passed trial, even if it leaves your body aching from exhaustion or your soul wincing in pain."
languages.original_text: "Стала"... это такое странное слово. Вроде и верное, но разве так говорят о предназначении? Если вопрос о том, каков был сам путь — об этом рассказать несложно. Сначала я, как и многие имперские сироты, прошла {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Схола Прогениум{/g}. Это были суровые годы, но я вспоминаю о них с радостью. Мало что сравнится с ощущением пройденного испытания, даже если после тело стонет от усталости или душа сжимается от боли".

traits.locale_text: "'Become'... It's such a strange word for it. It seems right, but is that how one talks about their destiny? If you're asking about the path itself — that's easy enough to answer. First, like many other Imperial orphans, I went through the Schola Progenium. Those years were rough, but I remember them fondly. Few things can compare with the feeling of a passed trial, even if it leaves your body aching frome exhaustion or your soul wincing in pain."

"'Become'... It's such a strange word for it. It seems right, but is that how one talks about their destiny? If you're asking about the path itself — that's easy enough to answer. First, like many other Imperial orphans, I went through the Schola Progenium. Those years were rough, but I remember them fondly. Few things can compare with the feeling of a passed trial, even if it leaves your body aching frome exhaustion or your soul wincing in pain."

Few things can compare with the feeling of satisfaction from a passed trial, even if it leaves your body aching from exhaustion or your soul wincing in pain."

languages.text: “‘成为’……这个词很古怪。虽然听起来没问题，但这个词真的可以用来谈论命定之事吗？如果你问的是我选择的道路本身，那这个问题很容易回答。我像许多其他孤儿一样，在{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}忠嗣学院{/g}熬了很多年。那段日子很难熬，但也是我美好的记忆，因为很少有什么能比得上通过试炼之后的满足感。即便试炼会让你的身体因疲惫而疼痛，让你的灵魂在痛苦中抽搐，也无所谓。”
languages.original_text: "'Become'... It's such a strange word for it. It seems right, but is that how one talks about their destiny? If you're asking about the path itself — that's easy enough to answer. First, like many other orphans, I endured the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Those years were rough, but I remember the hardship fondly. Few things can compare with the feeling of satisfaction from a passed trial, even if it leaves your body aching from exhaustion or your soul wincing in pain."

traits.locale_text: “‘成为’……这个词很古怪。虽然听起来没问题，但这个词真的可以用来谈论命定之事吗？如果你问的是我选择的道路本身，那这个问题很容易回答。我像帝国许多其他孤儿一样，在{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}忠嗣学院{/g}熬了很多年。那段日子很难熬，但也是我美好的记忆，因为很少有什么能比得上通过试炼之后的满足感。即便试炼会让你的身体因疲惫而疼痛，让你的灵魂在痛苦中抽搐，也无所谓。”

languages.original_text: "'Become'... It's such a strange word for it. It seems right, but is that how one talks about their destiny? If you're asking about the path itself — that's easy enough to answer. First, like many other orphans, I endured the Schola Progenium. Those years were rough, but I remember the hardship fondly. Few things can compare with the feeling of satisfaction from a passed trial, even if it leaves your body aching from exhaustion or your soul wincing in pain."

languages.text: «"Ingresar"... Es una palabra curiosa para ello. Es precisa, pero, ¿es así como habla una de su destino? Si lo que quiere saber es la ruta concreta, la respuesta es fácil. Primero, como muchos otros huérfanos, pasé por la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Fueron años duros, pero recuerdo con cariño esas dificultades. Hay pocos placeres comparables al de superar una prueba, por mucho que el cuerpo quede agotado y el alma se estremezca de dolor».
languages.original_text: "'Become'... It's such a strange word for it. It seems right, but is that how one talks about their destiny? If you're asking about the path itself — that's easy enough to answer. First, like many other orphans, I endured the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Those years were rough, but I remember the hardship fondly. Few things can compare with the feeling of satisfaction from a passed trial, even if it leaves your body aching from exhaustion or your soul wincing in pain."

traits.locale_text: «"Ingresar"... Es una palabra curiosa para ello. Es precisa, pero, ¿es así como habla una de su destino? Si lo que quiere saber es la ruta concreta, la respuesta es fácil. Primero, como muchos otros huérfanos del Imperium, pasé por la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Fueron años duros, pero recuerdo con cariño esas dificultades. Hay pocos placeres comparables al de superar una prueba, por mucho que el cuerpo quede agotado y el alma se estremezca de dolor».

languages.text: 「『なる』か…不思議な言葉だ。正しいような気もするが、人は自分の運命についてそのように語るものなのだろうか？もしあなたが、その道そのものについて尋ねているのなら…答えるのは簡単だ。まず、他の多くの孤児と同じように、私は{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}帝国教導院{/g}に耐えた。その年月は険しいものではあったが、その苦難を懐かしく思う。たとえ疲労で体が痛んだり、魂が苦痛に悶えたりしたとしても、試練を乗り越えた満足感に匹敵するものはほとんどないだろう」
languages.original_text: "'Become'... It's such a strange word for it. It seems right, but is that how one talks about their destiny? If you're asking about the path itself — that's easy enough to answer. First, like many other orphans, I endured the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Those years were rough, but I remember the hardship fondly. Few things can compare with the feeling of satisfaction from a passed trial, even if it leaves your body aching from exhaustion or your soul wincing in pain."

traits.locale_text: 「『なる』か…不思議な言葉だ。正しいような気もするが、人は自分の運命についてそのように語るものなのだろうか？もしあなたが、その道そのものについて尋ねているのなら…答えるのは簡単だ。まず、他の多くの帝国孤児と同じように、私は{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}帝国教導院{/g}に耐えた。その年月は険しいものではあったが、その苦難を懐かしく思う。たとえ疲労で体が痛んだり、魂が苦痛に悶えたりしたとしても、試練を乗り越えた満足感に匹敵するものはほとんどないだろう」

languages.text: "'Geworden' ... Welch ein merkwürdiges Wort dafür. Es erscheint richtig, gewiss, doch spricht man so über seine Bestimmung? Wenn Ihr nach dem Pfad selbst fragt, das ist leicht zu beantworten. Zuerst, wie viele andere Waisenkinder, habe ich die {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} durchgestanden. Es waren harte Jahre, doch ich erinnere mich gerne daran. Kaum etwas lässt sich mit der Befriedigung einer bestanden Prüfung vergleichen, selbst wenn der Körper vor Erschöpfung brennt oder die Seele vor Pein weint."
languages.original_text: "'Become'... It's such a strange word for it. It seems right, but is that how one talks about their destiny? If you're asking about the path itself — that's easy enough to answer. First, like many other orphans, I endured the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Those years were rough, but I remember the hardship fondly. Few things can compare with the feeling of satisfaction from a passed trial, even if it leaves your body aching from exhaustion or your soul wincing in pain."

traits.locale_text: "'Geworden' ... Welch ein merkwürdiges Wort dafür. Es erscheint richtig, gewiss, doch spricht man so über seine Bestimmung? Wenn Ihr nach dem Pfad selbst fragt, das ist leicht zu beantworten. Zuerst, wie viele andere imperiale Waisenkinder, habe ich die {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} durchgestanden. Es waren harte Jahre, doch ich erinnere mich gerne daran. Kaum etwas lässt sich mit der Befriedigung einer bestanden Prüfung vergleichen, selbst wenn der Körper vor Erschöpfung brennt oder die Seele vor Pein weint."

languages.text: « "Devenue"... Je trouve le mot perturbant. J'imagine qu'il n'est pas erroné de l'employer ici, mais est-ce ainsi que l'on parle de sa destinée ? Si vous m'interrogez sur la voie qui m'y a menée, la réponse est très simple. Tout d'abord, comme de nombreux orphelins, j'ai dû subir la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Ces années étaient rudes, mais j'y repense avec tendresse. Peu de choses sont aussi satisfaisantes que la réussite d'une épreuve, même si votre corps en ressort exténué et votre âme profondément meurtrie. »
languages.original_text: "'Become'... It's such a strange word for it. It seems right, but is that how one talks about their destiny? If you're asking about the path itself — that's easy enough to answer. First, like many other orphans, I endured the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Those years were rough, but I remember the hardship fondly. Few things can compare with the feeling of satisfaction from a passed trial, even if it leaves your body aching from exhaustion or your soul wincing in pain."

traits.locale_text: « "Devenue"... Je trouve le mot perturbant. J'imagine qu'il n'est pas erroné de l'employer ici, mais est-ce ainsi que l'on parle de sa destinée ? Si vous m'interrogez sur la voie qui m'y a menée, la réponse est très simple. Tout d'abord, comme de nombreux orphelins impériaux, j'ai dû subir la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Ces années étaient rudes, mais j'y repense avec tendresse. Peu de choses sont aussi satisfaisantes que la réussite d'une épreuve, même si votre corps en ressort exténué et votre âme profondément meurtrie. »

languages.text: "'Olmak'... Ne tuhaf bir söz. Kulağa doğru geliyor ama insan kendi kaderinden böyle mi bahseder? Bu kadere giden yolu soruyorsan cevabı basit. Birçok öksüz gibi başta benim günlerim de {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium'da{/g} geçti. Sancılı yıllardı ama o günkü güçlükler bugün canımı sıkmıyor. İmtihan geçmek kadar tatmin edici bir şey bulmak zordur. Yorgunluktan her yerin ağrısa, ruhunu acıdan kıvrandırsa da bu böyledir."
languages.original_text: "'Become'... It's such a strange word for it. It seems right, but is that how one talks about their destiny? If you're asking about the path itself — that's easy enough to answer. First, like many other orphans, I endured the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Those years were rough, but I remember the hardship fondly. Few things can compare with the feeling of satisfaction from a passed trial, even if it leaves your body aching from exhaustion or your soul wincing in pain."

traits.locale_text: "'Olmak'... Ne tuhaf bir söz. Kulağa doğru geliyor ama insan kendi kaderinden böyle mi bahseder? Bu kadere giden yolu soruyorsan cevabı basit. Birçok öksüz gibi başta benim günlerim de {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}'da geçti. Sancılı yıllardı ama güçlükler bugün canımı sıkmıyor. İmtihan geçmek kadar tatmin edici bir şey bulmak zordur. Yorgunluktan her yerin ağrısa da, ruhunu acıdan kıvrandırsa da bu böyledir."
